name: COH 2 - German Skin: (L) Voronezh Improvised Pattern
detailed_description:
GERMAN SKIN: (L) Voronezh Improvised Pattern
Spraying brownish sand color over the factory standard gray made for quickly applied but effective camouflage during the assault on Voronezh.

This skin is used only for the light weight class.
